Show Catppuccin Palette Colors

Source: R/utilities.R
show_catppuccin_palette.Rd

Display all colors in a Catppuccin flavor as a visual swatch. Useful for exploring available colors and choosing custom color combinations.

Usage

show_catppuccin_palette(
  flavor = getOption("ggcatppuccin.flavor", "mocha"),
  type = c("all", "accents", "neutrals")
)

Arguments

flavor

The Catppuccin flavor to use ("mocha", "latte", "frappe", "macchiato"). Defaults to the value set by set_catppuccin_flavor(), or "mocha" if not set.

type

Type of colors to show: "all" for all colors, "accents" for just accent colors, "neutrals" for base/text/surface colors.

Value

A ggplot2 object showing the color palette.

Examples

# Show all colors
show_catppuccin_palette("mocha")


# Show just accent colors
show_catppuccin_palette("latte", type = "accents")


# Show just neutrals
show_catppuccin_palette("frappe", type = "neutrals")
